item.description:
ORGANIZER: Adrian
CONTACT: http://photo.meetup.c...
TARGET AUDIENCE: All Members interested in seascapes, lighthouses, and night photography.

Combining the results of some recent polls, I'm organizing an afternoon and evening in and around Portsmouth. We'll begin by meeting in downtown Portsmouth (I'll finalize a location later, but meeting for lunch is certainly an option) and then take a short drive to Fort Foster where there are plenty of opportunities for seascapes, lighthouses, etc. We'll then head back to Portsmouth and the hardy amongst us can practice their night photography around town. The not-so-hardy (i.e. non native) can join me in a warmer place, such as the Portsmouth brewery to discuss "the one that got away..."

** As with all our events, please RSVP "no" if you do not want to hear about or receive messages about this event again. **
item.name: Afternoon seascapes and night photography
